text:
I feel this very very deeply
Even more so as a non-normal-very-much-larger sized female whose body parts don't need shrink wrapping with logos.

Interesting to learn the neckline strangulation is actually a female body type issue and not just me. Makes me feel a teeny bit better. https://t.co/niASm0A8Vm

author.description: Co-Founder of @CultureConIO | Conference speaker | Agile & Quality Geek | Creator of @SedgwickMeads | Rocket Scientist (yes really) | Opinions Definitely Mine!
author.name: Nicola Sedgwick
